Center: Center of Nuclear Physics Data, Russian Federal Nuclear Center (VNIIEF), Sarov, Russia
ref: Jour: Zeitschrift fuer Physik A, Hadrons and Nuclei, Vol.325, p.175 (1986)
title: Resonances in low energy elastic scattering of alpha particles from 28Si.

x4freetext: Resonances in low energy elastic scattering of alpha
particles from 28Si.

x4codes.hlp: National Accelerator Centre, Faure, South Africa, Rep.

x4codes.shortRef: Jour: Zeitschrift fuer Physik A, Hadrons and Nuclei, Vol.325, p.175 (1986)

x4freetext: 6 MV
The 100 mu silicon detectors mounted on
rotatable arms, with an angular accuracy of 0.1 degr.
Circular detector collimators subtended a solid angle
of 0.5 msr with an angular acceptance of 0.8 degr.
The target consisted of 250 mu-g/cm2 natural silicon
evaporated onto a backing consisting of a 40 mu-g/cm2
gold layer on a KAPTON film.
Forward angle elastic scattering from a thin gold
target, measured on both sides of the beam, was used to
determine the angular offset of the angle
determinations.
Rutherford scattering from the thin gold layer
sandwiched between the silicon target material and the
KAPTON backing, was used to monitor the total incident
flux.
Statistical error
Systematic error in the measured cross section
values, which is mainly due to uncertainties in the
silicon and gold target thicknesses.

x4code.headerHelp: Error in value of quantity, defined under ERR-ANALYS

x4freetext: The experimental error bars represent
statistical errors only.
